title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4831.11 - Additional testimony may be allowed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4831.11 - Additional testimony may be allowed

State Regulations

The commission may, upon application of any party, for
good cause shown, allow the production at the hearing of additional witnesses
and evidence in support of any facts material to the determination of the
appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4831.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
